channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Pearl couscous with sauteed cherry tomatoes
item.description:
Pearl couscous with sauteed cherry tomatoes



This is a simple dish with few ingredients and lots of flavor. The sauce is incredibly sweet and wraps itself around each nugget of couscous in the most delicious way.

item.title: Sardine pasta with crunchy parsley crumbs
item.description:
Sardine pasta with crunchy parsley crumbs



An affordable way to include oily fish in your diet. Canned sardines are a great source of omega 3 and add oomph to this simple, family pasta dish.

item.title: Jollof rice
item.description:
Jollof rice



This is the ultimate West African party dish. It is made in huge pans, often with whole chickens. The colour is a festive red and the taste is sweet, savoury, punchy with the zing of the peppers, and yet has a quickening tang that makes the dish a meal in itself.

item.title: Spicy bacon broccoli
item.description:
Spicy bacon broccoli



A little bacon goes a long way.

item.title: Bramley apple meatballs with bramley apple, cranberry sauce
item.description: Bramley apple meatballs with bramley apple, cranberry sauce
